sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ManyToManyChecker</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Script for checking if table is many to many table</description>
        <name>ManyToManyChecker</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ManyToManyChecker = Class.create();
ManyToManyChecker.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	SYS_M2M: 'sys_m2m',
	M2M_TABLE: 'm2m_table',
	
	isManyToMany :function(tableName) {
		var m2mTableQuery = new GlideRecord(this.SYS_M2M);
		
		if(!m2mTableQuery.isValid()) {
			return false;
		}

		m2mTableQuery.addQuery(this.M2M_TABLE, tableName);
		m2mTableQuery.query();
		
		return m2mTableQuery.next();
	},
	
    type: 'ManyToManyChecker'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-06-13 20:06:01</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8984a7c10f023300fd3e3632d4767e2a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ManyToManyChecker</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="List v2" source="com.glide.list_v2">f1dc30c36d2220100acb70b35343301f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8984a7c10f023300fd3e3632d4767e2a</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-06-13 21:55:00</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>454</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
